title: Gundam vs Hello Kitty
synopsis: While preparing for a tea party, Hello Kitty receives a distress signal from Haro. She travels to the Universal Century timeline to help Amuro Ray and the Gundam end the One Year War.
staff: [['Fujino, Sadayoshi', ['Sound Director']], ['Kaneko, Yuuji', ['Art Director']], ['Kotobuki, Tsukasa', ['Animation Director']], ['Kawashita, Yuuki', ['Director of Photography']]]
